org.jgrapes.net

Interface TcpChannel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Associator, Channel, Eligible, IOSubchannel, Subchannel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TcpConnectionManager.TcpChannelImpl

    public interface TcpChannel
extends IOSubchannel

    A special sub channel used for TCP connections.
